content:
ITEM NO.32               COURT NO.11               SECTION II-C
               S U P R E M E  C O U R T  O F  I N D I A
                       RECORD OF PROCEEDINGS
SPECIAL LEAVE PETITION (CRIMINAL) Diary No(s). 29352/2025
[Arising out of impugned final judgment and order dated  04-07-2022
in CRLAMD No. 223/2019 passed by the High Court of Judicature at 
Madras at Madurai]
NAGARAJAN                                          Petitioner(s)
                                VERSUS
STATE REPRESENTED BY THE INSPECTOR OF POLICE       Respondent(s)
(IA No. 145613/2025 - CONDONATION OF DELAY IN FILING, IA No.
145611/2025 - EXEMPTION FROM FILING C/C OF THE IMPUGNED JUDGMENT
AND IA No. 145612/2025 - EXEMPTION FROM FILING O.T.)
 
Date : 03-07-2025 This matter was called on for hearing today.
CORAM : 
         HON'BLE MR. JUSTICE M.M. SUNDRESH
         HON'BLE MR. JUSTICE K. VINOD CHANDRAN
For Petitioner(s) :Mr. Raghunatha Sethupathy B, AOR
                   Mr. Manoj Kumar A., Adv.
                   Ms. V. Shwetha, Adv.
                   
For Respondent(s) : 
        UPON hearing the counsel the Court made the following
                             O R D E R
Delay condoned.
Applications  seeking  exemption  from  filing
certified copy of the impugned judgment and from filing
official translations are allowed.
Issue notice in the special leave petition as
well as on the prayer for interim relief.
(NEETU KHAJURIA)
ASST.REGISTRAR-CUM-PS
(POONAM VAID)
ASSISTANT REGISTRAR
